title: The Spiral Staircase
description: Also published as Some Must Watch. This book has been the inspiration behind three movies.As Professor Sebastian Warren battens down the shutters and locks all the doors of their isolated country house, the eight occupants start to feel safe. Somewhere outside lurks a murderer of young girls, the latest only an earshot away. Is there really safety in numbers and what happens when their numbers start to dwindle?
author: Ethel Lina White
